channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love Under The Lemon Tree
channel.desc: While staying at the Lemon Tree Farm, budding photographer Beck must save things from growing sour and help the handsome owner save his land. Zesty romance.

channel.title: Sweeter Than Chocolate
channel.desc: A TV reporter investigates when she hears whisperings of a rumour that a local chocolatier has discovered the secret recipe to finding true love.

channel.desc: Oliver needs to fix his player reputation and Avery needs access to his fashion designer friend, so dating each other is simply a smart business decision. Or is it.

channel.desc: After being called out during the launch of her landmark study on love, an acclaimed professor is forced to take her own dating test with the man who criticised it.

channel.title: Sparks Over Brooklyn
channel.desc: Single chef Lidia sees her future plans fall apart when arrogant tech innovator Danny buys her restaurant and plans to completely remodel it. Can she convince him that less is more.

channel.desc: A blogger is offered her own column after her post about a terrible date goes viral. But there's a catch - to keep writing good content, she needs to keep seeing the bad date.
